config.name: config
config.author: ColdIV
config.description:
A small library which handles configuration variables.

This library can add the following arguments to your program:
  • exampleConfig to list all variables in config
  • exampleConfig config <variable name> to show the value of a specific variable
  • exampleConfig config <variable name> <value> to set a new value

discordAPI.name: discordAPI
discordAPI.author: ColdIV
discordAPI.description:
A small API that allows you to send messages to a Discord channel from a computer in Minecraft.
You will have to host your own API though.
